channel.title: Home on Ninevolt
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ninevolt

item.title: About
item.description: Aspirations This website is: A place for me to practice designing something and publishing it. A way to share a bit of what I love. A way to help people and help them to save time. Colophon Because this website is open source, all assets — including fonts — are shared publically in a GitHub repository. For this reason, the fonts I use on this website are open source.

item.title: Test Post
item.description: Hello This is a test post with a slug called test-slug.
